alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 11:24AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Orange County through NOON PDT... At 1124 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Anaheim, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anaheim, Santa Ana, Garden Grove, Orange, Fullerton, Yorba Linda, Stanton, Seal Beach, Westminster, Buena Park, La Habra, Placentia, Cypress, La Palma, Los Alamitos, Brea, Rossmoor, La Habra Heights and La Mirada. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland
